name.fr: Le silence est d'or, le bruit est de Roc
name.en: Silence Is Golden, Sound is Rock
name.es: El silencio es de oro, y el ruido, de roca
name.de: Schweigen ist Gold, Lärm ist Gestein
name.pt: O silêncio é de ouro, o barulho é de Rocha

description.fr: Vaincre tous les Craqueleurs. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} Pose {value:r}\_{ObjectMechanism:1607} sur {r, plural, one[une case aléatoire] other[des cases aléatoires]}. \--- {%FightTurnEnded} Détruit l’{%ar} des Craqueleurs pour infliger autant de dégâts aux adversaires autour d'eux.
description.en: Defeat all the Cracklers. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} Places {value:r}\_{ObjectMechanism:1607,value:r} on {r, plural, one[one random cell] other[random cells]}. \--- {%FightTurnEnded} Destroys the Cracklers' {%ar} to do the same amount of damage to opponents around\_ them.
description.es: Vencer a todos los crujidores. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} Coloca {value:r}\_{ObjectMechanism:1607} en {r, plural, one[una casilla aleatoria] other[casillas aleatorias]}. \--- {%FightTurnEnded} Destruye la {%ar} de los crujidores para infligir los mismos daños a los adversarios alrededor de ellos.
description.de: Alle Krachler besiegen. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} Platziert {value:r}\_{ObjectMechanism:1607} auf {r, plural, one[einem zufälligen Feld] other[zufälligen Feldern]}. \--- {%FightTurnEnded} Zerstört {%ar} der Krachler, um Gegnern ringsum\_ entsprechend viel Schaden zuzufügen.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Smagadores. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} Coloca {value:r}\_{ObjectMechanism:1607} sobre {r, plural, one[uma célula aleatória] other[células aleatórias]}. \--- {%FightTurnEnded} Destrói o {%ar} dos Smagadores para infligir danos aos adversários em\_volta\_ deles.
